title: [Question] Can I skip the first class
content: Yesterday I had done admission through KCET and I won't be able to come to college at 8 am (I'm not in Bengaluru right now) , will I be able to attend classes from 2nd period ??

comments.body: you might be asked to write a apology letter that is the max that cn happen
No? Just keep it above 75% all subjects, you can miss whenever you want
Can u tell me what they might do in first class
Idk bro introduce themselves and shit? Not any major stuff
Ya u can just skip it nobody asks if u came they take attendance every period so doesnâ€™t matter
